fw.name: BatchInfrastructure
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

method.name: GetCAAStatePub
method.abstract: Retrieves the CATBatStatePubCAA singleton.

method.name: SetBatchState
method.abstract: Publish the state of your batch.

method.name: SetLicenceState
method.abstract: Publish the licencing state of your batch.

method.name: DeleteLogs
method.abstract: This method delete the log of the batch.

method.name: PutInLog
method.abstract: This method writes in the log of the batch.

method.name: GetBatchUUID
method.abstract: Notification for BatchMonitoring .

class.name: CATBatchParameters
class.abstract: Class generating the batch parameter XML file.

method.name: BeginBuffer
method.abstract:
Initialize the XML input parameter file and generate the root tag
Role: This method allows you to initialize an XML parameter file.

method.name: BeginInput
method.abstract: Opens a Input section.

method.name: BeginOutput
method.abstract: Opens a Output section.

method.name: EndBuffer
method.abstract:
Closes the XML input parameter file
Role: This method close the XML input parameter file.

method.name: EndInput
method.abstract: Closes a Input section.

method.name: EndOutput
method.abstract: Closes a Ouput section.

method.name: GetFullPath
method.abstract: Retrieves the full path of the current XML parameter file.

method.name: GetOutputParamFile
method.abstract: Retrieves the current output parameter within a batch.

method.name: GetOutputParamPath
method.abstract: Retrieves the path of the output XML file.

method.name: InsertFile
method.abstract: Inserts a &ltfile&gt tag in your XML file.

method.name: InsertFolder
method.abstract: Inserts a &ltfolder&gt tag in your XML file.

method.name: InsertSimpleArg
method.abstract: Inserts a &ltsimple_arg&gt tag in your XML file.

method.name: InsertTag
method.abstract: Inserts a custom string in your XML file.

method.name: InsertUTF8Tag
method.abstract: Inserts a custom string in your XML file.

function.name: CATBatchParamToSplitAccess
function.abstract: Retrieves the XML parameter to be splitted in a splitter batch.

function.name: CloseParameterFile
function.abstract: Close a parameter file in a splitter batch.

function.name: GetBatchRootCAA
function.abstract: Retrieves the root directory of the batch.

function.name: InitParameterFile
function.abstract: Initialize a parameter file in a splitter batch.

method.name: AllowVisuInLocalBatchs
method.abstract:
Allow the batch to access the graphical adapater
Role: This method is to be called if your computer have a graphical adapter A few batches may use the graphical adapter for computation aid.

method.name: GetBatchRC
method.abstract: Retrieves the status of a V5 Batch.

method.name: GetBatchStatus
method.abstract: Retrieves the status of a V5 Batch.

method.name: GetTheClientMonitorCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves the static singleton of CATBatClientMonitorCAA class.

method.name: InitializeV5Monitoring
method.abstract:
Initialize the monitoring mechanism for V5 Batch
Role: This method set the callback mechanism which allow you to monitor a V5 batch.

method.name: KillBatch
method.abstract: Kill a V5 Batch.

method.name: StartV5Batch
method.abstract: Start a V5 Batch.

method.name: WaitOnMessage
method.abstract:
Block the current process to wait for incoming Batch monitoring messages
Role: This method make the current process wait for Batch monitoring messages until exitCond is true.

class.name: CATIBatchCAA
class.abstract: Interface giving access to the xml files of your batch.

method.name: get_Description
method.abstract: Retrieves the description of the batch.

method.name: get_InputParametersCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing your inputs.

method.name: get_Name
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the batch.

method.name: get_OutputParametersCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing your outputs.

method.name: get_UUID
method.abstract: Retrieves the uuid of the running batch.

class.name: CATIBatchElementCAA
class.abstract: Interface representing a node in a batch parameter XML file.

method.name: BoolArg
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of the attribute "value" on a "simple_arg" node.

method.name: BoolValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific attibute's value on the current node.

method.name: DoubleArg
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of the attribute "value" on a "simple_arg" node.

method.name: DoubleValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific attibute's value on the current node.

method.name: FloatArg
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of the attribute "value" on a "simple_arg" node.

method.name: FloatValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific attibute's value on the current node.

method.name: LongArg
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of the attribute "value" on a "simple_arg" node.

method.name: LongValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific attibute's value on the current node.

method.name: ParameterCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific child of the current node.

method.name: StringArg
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of the attribute "value" on a "simple_arg" node.

method.name: StringValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a specific attibute's value on the current node.

method.name: get_ChildrenCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing the children node list.

method.name: get_FileListCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing the "file" children node list.

method.name: get_FolderListCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing the "folder" children node list.

method.name: get_ParentElementCAA
method.abstract: Retrieves an interface describing the father node.

method.name: get_Path
method.abstract: Retrieves the path attribute value of a file or a folder node.

method.name: get_TagName
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the node.

class.name: CATIBatchElementsCAA
class.abstract: Interface representing a list of nodes in a batch parameter XML file.

method.name: ItemCAA
method.abstract:
Retrieves a node
Role: This method retrieves an interface on a node contained in the list by giving in its index.

method.name: get_Count
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of nodes in the list.

method.name: get_ParentElementCAA
method.abstract:
Retrieves the father node
Role: This method retrieves an interface on a father node of the current object.
